apis.description: Obtain all of the escrow officers for this user

operations.summary: Obtains all of the escrow officers in the office for this user

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: A username -or- order access key - for an example use 'bsmith'

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: A password -or- order secret access key - for an example use 'password'

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: A date filter for filtering after the given UTC date/time (format is YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)

operations.summary: Search escrow officers by name, email, or phone number. Can return multiple results.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: A username -or- order access key - for an example use 'bsmith'

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: A password -or- order secret access key - for an example use 'password'
